title: DevOps Engineer (m/f/d)
body:
About Hays

IT specialists hold all the cards: for its customers in industry and the public sector, Hays is looking for motivated employees who like looking at the bigger picture and growing with new challenges.

We make sure that you benefit from our many years of experience in IT recruitment and will find you the right role to suit your skills and interests - all completely free of charge to you. Register with us and reap the benefits of job offers that are both interesting and relevant to your skills and experience.

My duties

  • Implementation and evaluation of new tools for development, CI and CD for strategic software platforms in an international environment
  • Responsible for the modernization and implementation of development processes
  • Operate within global projects and collaborations
  • Expansion of cloud technologies

My qualifications

  • Educational background in IT (HTL, University)
  • Solid experience in Java, Maven, Git and Jenkins
  • Ability to understand how codes are built and developed
  • Fruitful knowledge of Docker and Windows scripting or Linux
  • Interest in using new technologies and trends
  • Fluent in English language
  • German language is an advantage
  • Good communication skills and a supporter of teamwork

My benefits

  • Development opportunities
  • Possibility to travel if interested
  • Jobticket
  • Company doctor
Gehaltsinformationen

The minimum salary for this position is â‚¬ 50.000 gross/annually. An overpayment is planned and depends on your qualifications and experience.

My contact at Hays
